title: Fs: T206 sgc 40 - PRICES REDUCED ON ALL REMAINING!
author: t206hound

posts.post_title: Fs: T206 sgc 40 - PRICES REDUCED ON ALL REMAINING!
posts.post_content:
THE 40S AREN'T MOVING LIKE THE OTHERS, SO I'VE DROPPED THE PRICES TWO TO THREE DOLLARS EACH!

Most of these are fresh from slabbing in Jersey. Price includes delivery; paypal preferred. Feel free to make an offer on multiples.
[URL="http://gallery.me.com/kimsummers#100182"]
Check out front and back scans here.[/URL] There is an option to download each scan which will give you a larger view. 
I also have [URL="http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=151044"]SGC 30s[/URL] and [URL="http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=151257"]SGC 50s[/URL] for sale.
